name: Symgrate2 Plugin
description: This is a client plugin for recovering symbols using the Symgrate2 server.
longdescription: Symgrate2 is a symbol recovery database with a publicly query-able sever.  This client runs through every function of the current project, querying the server and printing the names of matches.
